text: Masao Maruyama is the name of: *Masao Maruyama (Japanese Army officer) (1889–1957), commander in the Imperial Japanese Army during World War II *Masao Maruyama (scholar) (1914–1996), political theorist and historian *Masao Maruyama (film producer) (born 1941), producer for animation company Studio Madhouse
title: Masao Maruyama
